docs.lead_paragraph: FOR the Hundred Neediest Cases of New York City THE NEW YORK TIMES today makes its twenty-sixth yearly appeal. Here, on these pages, are printed 100 stories of tragic want; of want that cuts deeper than hunger and cold; of the deepest want known to exist in the city today.

headline.main: NEW YORK'S 100 NEEDIEST CASES; " IN PRIVATE CHARITY LIES THE HOPE OF MANY"
